mapper.select: SELECT tc.task_no taskNo , COUNT(tc.task_no) cmtCnt FROM task_comment tc INNER JOIN task t ON tc.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE tl.project_no = #{projectNo} GROUP BY tc.task_no

SELECT tc.task_cmt_no taskCmtNo , tc.task_cmt_content taskCmtContent , tc.task_cmt_writer taskCmtWriter , tc.create_date createDate , tc.task_cmt_upper_no taskCmtUpperNo , wm.work_member_name workMemberName FROM task_comment tc INNER JOIN task t ON tc.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON p.work_no = wm.work_no WHERE wm.work_member_email = tc.task_cmt_writer AND tc.task_no = #{taskNo} ORDER BY tc.create_date DESC

SELECT tc.task_cmt_no taskCmtNo , tc.task_cmt_content taskCmtContent , tc.create_date createDate , tc.task_cmt_upper_no taskCmtUpperNo , wm.work_member_name workMemberName FROM task_comment tc INNER JOIN task t ON tc.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON p.work_no = wm.work_no WHERE wm.work_member_email = tc.task_cmt_writer AND tc.task_cmt_no = #{taskCmtNo}

SELECT tc.task_cmt_no taskCmtNo , tc.task_cmt_content taskCmtContent , tc.task_cmt_writer taskCmtWriter , tc.create_date createDate , tc.task_cmt_upper_no taskCmtUpperNo , wm.work_member_name workMemberName FROM task_comment tc INNER JOIN task t ON tc.task_no = t.task_no INNER JOIN task_list tl ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON p.work_no = wm.work_no WHERE wm.work_member_email = tc.task_cmt_writer AND tc.task_no = #{taskNo} AND tc.task_cmt_fix = 'Y'
SELECT task_cmt_content taskCmtContent FROM task_comment WHERE task_cmt_no = #{taskCmtNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_comment ( task_no , task_cmt_content , task_cmt_writer , task_cmt_fix , create_date , update_date , task_cmt_upper_no ) VALUES ( #{taskNo} , #{taskCmtContent} , #{taskCmtWriter} , 'N' , NOW() , NOW() , IF(#{taskCmtUpperNo} = 0, null, #{taskCmtUpperNo}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE task_comment SET task_cmt_fix = 'Y' WHERE task_cmt_no = #{taskCmtNo}
UPDATE task_comment SET task_cmt_fix = 'N' WHERE task_cmt_no != #{taskCmtNo}
